MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-DEC-2020 18:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the EH23 postcode area of Peebles. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.34 pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived on site to  investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.45pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
